title: Short-Term Energy Demand Forecast
description: A trading analyst requires a day-ahead demand forecast for a specific grid region to inform bidding strategy.

tasks.description: Retrieve historical demand data for the past 7 days for the target region.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent fetches hourly historical load data.

tasks.description: Get the weather forecast (temperature, cloud cover) for the next 24 hours for the same region.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the relevant hourly weather forecast.

tasks.description: Generate an hourly demand forecast for the next 24 hours using the historical and weather data.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a forecast with confidence intervals.
